issue_comments.body:
A quick and ugly workaround:
In src/Ui/UiRequest.py:
```
421c421
<                 theme = user.settings.get("theme", "light")
---
>                 theme = "light"
440c440
<         themeclass = "theme-%-6s" % re.sub("[^a-z]", "", user.settings.get("theme", "light"))
---
>         themeclass = "theme-%-6s" % re.sub("[^a-z]", "", "light")
```
